name: Shoot Out!
description:
Can you save the good guys?

The aim of the game, eliminate all the bad guys and save the good people!

Swipe left and right to control all characters good and bad and tap on the screen to fire, but make sure you don't hit a good guy otherwise it's game over.

Use objects like barrels, logs and mirrors to help you in tricky situations.

Shoot Out! features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Crazy ragdoll physics
- Simple and colorful art style
- Increasingly challenging levels
